fields.name: Arguments
fields.description:
Gets or sets the collection of override arguments to be used when
executing a build step.

fields.name: ContextPath
fields.description: The source context against which run has to be queued.

fields.name: File
fields.description: The file against which run has to be queued.

fields.name: Target
fields.description: The name of the target build stage for the docker build.

fields.name: UpdateTriggerToken
fields.description: Base64 encoded update trigger token that will be attached with the base image trigger webhook.

fields.name: Values
fields.description: The collection of overridable values that can be passed when running a Task.
